deepdish
========

Deep learning experiments at the University of Chicago.

* http://deepdish.io

Installation
------------
Make sure that you have Cython and Numpy installed. Then run::

    pip install deepdish

Documentation
-------------

* http://deepdish.readthedocs.org/
